desc: Zenzimats creates eco-friendly yoga mats which are made of biodegradable, 100% natural tree rubber and synthetic vegan suede surface, ultra-soft touch. The designs are unique and come in two sizes; 1.5mm Travel Yoga Mat (foldable & super light!) and 3.5mm Yoga Mat. Limited stock, Pre-order now!

layout.text: Start your eco-friendly yoga journey here
